posts.post_content:
Hi all, I'm looking to sell some of my T212 Obaks. I accept  PayPal, check or MO  for   these.  Prices are net to me, so please add 3%  for regular  PayPal.  Domestic shipping is $3.50 for orders under $100, over $100 is on me.  Shipping to other countries, I will work  with you on price.  

Scans available on  request.

1909
Delmas, raw, creases and corner wear,  probable trim- $[strike]65[/strike]sold
Eagan, raw, light crease on front, spot of paper loss on back- $[strike]75[/strike]sold
LaLonge, SGC 10 (1), writing on front and back-$[strike]60[/strike]sold

1910 
175 Subjects
Blankenship, "Convenient Sensible," SGC 40 (3), pretty card-$[strike]65[/strike]sold
Mundorff, "A New Standard," clean front, major paper loss on back-$25
Ostdiek, "No Paste Used," raw, crease right through his face and neck, stamped back-$35
Roth, "Perfect Flavor," SGC 40 (3), a touch of snow on the front, nice card-$[strike]65[/strike]sold
Streib, "High Quality," SGC 50 (4), really nice card-$[strike]85[/strike]sold

Make an offer, you never know!

Hogan, raw, light crease on front, registration off, two spots of paper loss on back-$[strike]75[/strike] sold
Murphy, "Mild and Pure," SGC 30 (2), normal wear along corners and edges-$[strike]50[/strike] sold
J. Smith, "They Please," SGC 40 (3), light WST on front, stamped on back, normal wear to corners and edges-$[strike]65[/strike] sold 
Browning, "Just Right," raw, creases, corner and edge wear, nice image with a tough to find slogan-$[strike]40[/strike]sold
Criger, raw, heavy creases and a tear, poor shape-$[strike]10[/strike]sold

PM, or e-mail with questions or offers ( [URL="skeltone@rocketmail.com"]skeltone@rocketmail.com[/URL]  ). A firm "I'll take it" will out do ongoing  negotiations.  Thanks for looking.

Hi Ed
I will take both the 150s 
thanks Ron
Several still available, feel free to make an offer!
